name: Heart for Art Trust
briefDescription: Heart for Art enhances earnings and livelihoods of rural artisans of India. It provides them with assistance to get their products market ready and provides strong market linkages by providing access to markets and consumers through all modern methods of retail – getting products into lifestyle retail stores, melas and exhibitions, consumer workshops and a Online Store (www.heartforartonline.com) that delivers to consumers all over the country. We currently work with more than 25 different crafts across the country. We work on educating consumers, corporates and public institutions on the promotion of Handmade in India – Arts & Crafts.
